description: {"blocks":[{"key":"arba4","text":"Lysosomal biology is increasingly implicated in neurodegenerative diseases and health. It has traditionally been difficult to profile the metabolomic homeostasis of the lysosome in disease states. To overcome this challenge we have developed the Tagless Lyso-IP method to rapidly prepare lysosome enriched samples from human peripheral blood. This protocol details the processing and untargeted analysis of nonpolar metabolites derived using the Tagless Lyso-IP method. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"d79je","text":"This method is following successful isolation of lysosomes the Tagless Lyso-IP method as described\nin: dx.doi.org/10.17504/protocols.io.x54v9yp51g3e/v1 (Tagless Lyso-IP). {"blocks":[{"key":"6tdvd","text":"Resuspend the lysosomes attached to the magnetic beads and the pelleted whole cell samples in   of chloroform:methanol at ratio of 2:1 (v/v) with 1000x diluted Splashmix (Avanti). {"blocks":[{"key":"d7t1g","text":"Insert   of supernatant into glass insert vials for LC/MS.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":7,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"chvje","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"45","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"5hvrc","text":"Set an ID-X tribrid mass spectrometer (Thermo Fisher Scientific) with a heated electrospray ionization (HESI) probe, for initial nonpolar lipid profiling.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"4lb05","text":"Prepare an Ascentis Express C18 150 x 2.1 mm column (Millipore Sigma 53825-U) coupled with a 5 x 2.1 mm guard (Sigma-Aldrich 53500-U), to carry out C18-based lipid separation prior to mass spectrometry. Use EASYICTM for internal calibration.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"cdv45","text":"For C18-based lipid separation, for buffer preparation refer to the material section.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"faa6j","text":"Set the chromatographic gradient flow rate to 0.26 mL/min.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"dn69f","text":"Operate the mass spectrometer in full-scan mode with data-dependent tandem mass spectrometry (ddMS2) at m/z 250-1500, with","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1sq8m","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"s273","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"fmuq4","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"tables","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"cellsMeta":{},"colTitles":["",""],"colWidths":["173","146"],"data":[["Cycle time","1.5 sec"],["Microscans","1 unit"],["Isolation window","m/z 1"],["Intensity threshold","1 x 104"],["Dynamic exclusion time","2.5 sec"]],"guid":"AD800D7BCB3441108152413284CFD1B6","isJexcelDataFormat":true,"legend":"","mergeCells":{},"printData":[["Cycle time","1.5 sec"],["Microscans","1 unit"],["Isolation window","m/z 1"],["Intensity threshold","1 x 104"],["Dynamic exclusion time","2.5 sec"]],"rowHeights":[23,23,23,23,23]}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"fvinc","text":"LipidSearch and Compound Discoverer (Thermo Fisher Scientific) were used for unbiased\ndifferential analysis. Lipid annotation was acquired from LipidSearch with the precursor\ntolerance at 5 ppm and product tolerance at 8 ppm.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"4dfor","text":"Use Orbitrap resolution 120,000 for MS1 and 30,000 for MS2.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"fhhnq","text":"Set positive ion voltage to 3250 V, negative ion voltage to 3000 V, ion transfer tube temperature to  , and vaporizer temperature to  .","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":101,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":133,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"4dorr","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"300","unit":10}},"1":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"375","unit":10}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"1s305","text":"Set sheath gas flow to 40 units, auxiliary gas flow to 10 units, and sweep gas flow to 1 unit. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"7vj5c","text":"From 0−1.5 min isocratically elute at 32% B.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"fcgg1","text":"From 1.5-4 min linearly increase to 45% B.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"21m10","text":"From 4-5 min linearly increase to 52% B.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"3okgf","text":"From 8-11 min linearly increase to 66% B.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"1sda5","text":"From 5-8 min linearly increase to 58% B.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"3qsgf","text":"From 11-14 min linearly increase to 70%.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"evjus","text":"From 14-18 min linearly increase to 75%.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"c2or4","text":"From 18- 21 min linearly increase to 97% B.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"3aj9u","text":"From 21-35 min hold at 97% B.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"87qbr","text":"From 35-35.1 min linearly decrease to 32% B.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"574o4","text":"From 35.1-40 min hold at 32% min.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"18vco","text":"For HCD fragmentation, use step-wise collision energies of 15%, 25%, and 35%.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"fvbqd","text":"Use AGC target 4x105 for MS1 and 5x104 for MS2.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"bnul5","text":"Use maximum injection time 50 ms for MS1 and 54 ms for MS2.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"4e4cs","text":"Use RF lens at 40%.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

title: Untargeted lipidomics of Tagless Lyso-IP
